about.title: About me
about.description1: Web developer for several years, I continuously seek to improve my skills and take on new challenges.
about.description2: Curious, passionate and always eager to learn, I constantly explore new technologies and approaches.

project1.name: Pixel War
project1.description: A blank canvas where each user can place a pixel every X minutes. Real-time chat and a global leaderboard encourage players to express their creativity.

project2.name: Online Connect Four
project2.description: Uses Socket.IO to create a real-time Connect Four game that tracks finger movements and detects when they are brought together to validate a move.

project3.name: Canvas
project3.description: Project exploring the possibilities of a canvas through an artistic research on a theme

project4.name: UI Library
project4.description: Project to create a UI library based on collaborative work by setting up a CI/CD pipeline.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Ready to collaborate on future projects?
